backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing required UI updates for contact info, phone number, and founder details across specific frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of various frontend components and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH design tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout composing header, all sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Validated contact form component with fields, error handling, and simulated async submission.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an About section with company overview, mission, story, and value cards using icon-based highlights.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays a contact section with founder details, address, phone, email, business hours, and an embedded contact form.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Defines the homepage hero section with a headline, highlights, CTA buttons, and a hero image with floating stats.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Shows the service area overview with base location, coverage details, and a list of regions served.
Provides a grid of service cards describing coal, agriculture, and goods transport, each with features and icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with company info, founder details, links, services, and contact information.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, scroll behavior, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for backend React Query hooks; currently exports nothing because no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom industrial color theme using CSS variables, along with typography and utility adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the site's design system.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioning, and a list of implemented website features and requirements.
